title: Banknote Privacy Policy
description: Banknote is an tool that helps businesses track and manage their monye. We collect information from our users to help us improve our product and provide better service.

title: Information We Collect
description:
We collect the following information from our users:
 Name 
 Email address
 Contact information 
 Usage data

title: How We Use Your Information
description:
We use the information we collect from our users to: 
 Provide and improve our product 
 Communicate with our users
 Send marketing and promotional materials 
 Analyze user behavior
Comply with applicable laws and regulations

title: How We Share Your Information
description: We do not share your information with third parties.

title: Your Choices
description: You can choose to limit the amount of information you share with us. You can also opt out of receiving marketing and promotional materials from us. To do so, please contact us at privacy@boxpend.com

title: Security
description: We take security seriously and have implemented measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.

title: Changes to This Policy
description: We may update this policy from time to time. If we make any material changes, we will notify you by email or through a prominent notice on our website.

title: Contact Us
description: If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us at Banknote@banknote.com
